name: 簡詔群
objective:
此課程提供理解媒體報導全球暖化相關議題必要的基本知識，主要內容包括以下重點：
一、氣候變化與全球暖化現況概述
二、地球溫室效應與主要溫室氣體簡介
三、氣候的人為暖化與自然變異
四、有關全球暖化熱門議題探討
This is an introductory course to Global Warming. The purpose of the course is aimed to give some basic knowledge to college students for understanding those Global-Warming related issues that have been frequently covered by popular news media. The contents of the course include: 1.Climate change and the recent warming trend of the earth. 2.Green house effects and green house gases. 3.Attribution of recent climate change. 4.Discussion on popular issues of global warming.
